description:
SHOP NOW. PAY LATER
Tabby lets you shop what you love and split purchases into four monthly payments — with no interest, no hidden fees and no surprises. Whether you're shopping online or in store, Tabby gives you control, financial flexibility and peace of mind.

SHOP FROM TOP BRANDS
Discover and shop your favorite brands including AMAZON, SHEIN, IKEA, ADIDAS, SIVVI, CENTREPOINT, and many more in one shopping app. The Tabby app is your one-stop shopping destination, packed with fashion, electronics, home goods, makeup, and more.

COMPARE PRICES & SAVE MONEY
Track price drops and compare products across multiple stores. With smart alerts, you’ll always get the best deal — your personal price-checker, built right in.

NEW DEALS AND DISCOUNTS EVERY DAY
Shop daily discounts, coupons and promotions from top brands. Never miss a deal — just open the app and see what’s new.

FIND NEARBY STORES THAT ACCEPT TABBY
Use our in-store map to discover shops and malls that accept Tabby. Try before you buy and still pay later. Search by brand, category or location.

ONE APP FOR ALL YOUR SHOPPING
Manage payments, track purchases, get reminders and explore new brands — all in one app.

PROTECT YOUR PURCHASE WITH TABBY CARE
Tabby Care adds extra peace of mind. It covers your purchases, makes returns easy and protects your order every step of the way.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
Use chat in the Tabby app for round-the-clock support.

Tabby gives you the freedom to pay later with no interest, no fees and no surprises — so you can shop on your terms.

Follow us to stay up-to-date on new stores and latest deals:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tabbypay/

X: https://x.com/paywithtabby/

Need help? Reach out to http://help.tabby.ai/

Address: Kuwait, Sharq, Al Shuhada Street, NBK Tower
Fees: No fees for account opening 
Awards: Awarded for the “the Best Information Security and Fraud Management” in Global Finance’s World’s Best Digital Bank Awards (2024). World’s Best Digital Banks 2024: Round 1 | Global Finance Magazine https://gfmag.com/award/award-winners/worlds-best-digital-banks-2024-round-1/


We're changing the banking game. Weyay is Kuwait's first digital bank. We empower you – our country's next generation – to take control of your money and unleash your potential. All from your mobile phone. Here's how…

BUILT ON TRUST
Weyay is the brainchild of the National Bank of Kuwait. Powered by the financial expertise of our parent company, you know your money is in safe hands.

FUSS-FREE, FULLY-DIGITAL SIGN UP
Open an account from your mobile phone in minutes. No more paperwork, no more waiting in lines. We've made it safe and easy – just take a quick selfie and scan your Civil ID, and you're in.

THE LATEST TECH KEEPS YOUR ACCOUNT SAFE
We use super-smart, super-secure technology to keep your account safe and make banking easy. Face ID lets you log in quickly, and OTP codes help verify your identity.

YOUR OWN CUSTOM CARD
Customize your Weyay card to suit your taste. Choose from green or blue and make it yours. We'll deliver it directly to you, but you don't have to wait – you can access your card details anytime from the app.

IT'S EASY TO GET YOUR ALLOWANCE
Transfer your allowance to your Weyay account in a few taps, and get a special treat when your first payment lands. Then unlock more rewards every month.

TOP UP YOUR ACCOUNT, FAST
Use any Kuwait-based debit card to quickly add money to your Weyay account, or just top it up with a bank transfer.

REWARDS YOU'LL LOVE
The exclusive rewards start the moment you join. The more you use Weyay, the more you get. Try features to unlock cool stuff, or get money off the brands you love.

KEEP TRACK OF YOUR MONEY
Stay in control of your money and check transactions as they happen, from the app.
If anything does not look right, you can raise it immediately with a few taps.

24/7 SUPPORT
Life doesn't stop. That's why we are available round-the-clock to help when you need it. Chat with us on WhatsApp, or call our Solutions Center anytime.

THERE'S MORE TO COME…

EASILY SPLIT THE BILL WITH FRIENDS
No more confusion over who owes what. We'll do all the math for you. Send requests to those who need to pay up, and make it easy to pay your share.

HIT YOUR GOALS WITH SAVING POTS
We'll help you save like a pro. Create pots and set personal goals – it's super quick and simple to top them up and the app will do the rest. We'll give you nudges to keep you motivated and on track, and celebrate with you when you hit them.

PAY BILLS FROM YOUR PHONE
Keep on top of those bills – pay for your mobile phone or any other bills with a few taps in the app.

TRANSFER MONEY TO FRIENDS IN A TAP 
We've made sending money to friends (and getting money from them) easy and fun. No bank details needed – just sync your contacts. Add a note, image or voice note and make it personal.

WANT TO JOIN US?
Get the Weyay app, open your account today and start creating your future.

مع خدمة "التمويل أون لاين" من "بيتك" يمكنك الآن إتمام معاملاتك المالية بسهولة وأمان باستخدام أجهزة IPhone و IPod Touch و IPad
‎‪للدخول إلى الخدمة يرجى استخدام اسم المستخدم و كلمة السر الخاصة بك لخدمة "التمويل أون لاين"
‎‪مميزات الخدمة:
 
-  عرض ملخص أرصدة الحسابات و الودائع
-  عرض كشف تفصيلي لحساباتك
-  متابعة معاملات وتسوية مستحقات بطاقاتك الائتمانية
-  تحويلات المالية بين حساباتك الخاصة
-  تحويلات المالية إلى حسابات أخرى داخل بيتك
- تحويلات مالية لبنوك محلية وعالمية
- تحويل إلى حساب بيتك للتداول
- التبرع للجان الخيرية
-  إمكانية تغيير كلمة السر وتعديل آلية رمز الدخول
-  دفع فواتير
-  شراء بطاقات الدفع المسبق للهاتف النقال
-  عرض تفاصيل المعاملات التجارية و دفع الأقساط التجارية
-  الإبلاغ عن فقدان أو سرقة بطاقة الائتمان أو بطاقة سحب آلي
-  تفعيل بطاقة الصرف الآلي وبطاقة الإئتمان
-  طلب دفتر شيكات
-  خدمة البريد الإلكتروني
-  خدمة الرسائل القصيرة
-  خدمة حماية بطاقات الإئتمان
-  ربط الحسابات على بطاقة الصرف الآلي
-  أوامر دائمة للحسابات، للبطاقات، للجان خيرية
- والمزيد من الخدمات الآخرى
 
‎‪للاشتراك في خدمة "التمويل أون لاين" أو للحصول على الصلاحيات الكاملة، يرجى الاتصال على خدمة ألو بيتك الهاتفية 1803333 أو مراجعة أقرب فرع مصرفي لـ " بيتك".

Taly makes shopping smarter and easier with 0% interest, 100% Sharia-compliant payment solutions. Whether you’re buying fashion, electronics, home essentials, or more, you can shop now and split your payments into convenient payments — without extra fees.

With Taly, you can:
• Shop with top brands in Kuwait.
• Enjoy Pay Later, or split payments in up to 4 payments.
• Get instant approvals.
• Track purchases, due dates, and payment history in one simple dashboard.
• Experience a secure, CBK-licensed platform you can trust.

Taly is designed to give you flexibility, financial control, and a seamless shopping journey — online or in-store. 
Download today and start enjoying to pay your way.

تطبيق بوبيان مُصمّم ليوفّر لك أفضل الخدمات المصرفية أينما كنت. مع أكثر من 15 خدمة وميزة يتم إطلاقها لأول مرة في الكويت، يبقى تطبيق بوبيان في مركز الريادة في مجال الخدمات المصرفية الرقمية في الكويت.


كل خدمات الحسابات والبطاقات والودائع والتمويل في متناول يدك أينما كنت 

باستخدام التطبيق، يمكنك على الفور الاطّلاع على معاملات حساباتك، وتغيير رمز PIN الخاص ببطاقتك، ودفع أقساط التمويل، وإدارة الودائع، وحتى فتح حساب أو وديعة جديدة.


إرسال واستقبال الأموال في أي مكان وأي وقت 

يمكنك تحويل الأموال إلى أي مكان في العالم باستخدام التحويلات المصرفية العادية أو ويسترن يونيون. يمكنك أيضًا إرسال الأموال إلى أي حامل بطاقة مدنية كويتية واستلام المدفوعات فورًا من أي حامل بطاقة سحب آلي كويتية ببساطة من خلال مشاركة رابط الدفع معه.


سحب الأموال دون استخدام البطاقة المصرفية 

خدمة السحب بدون بطاقة متوفرة في جميع أجهزة الصراف الآلي لبوبيان في جميع أنحاء الكويت. اختر المبلغ من خلال التطبيق واستلمه من جهاز الصراف الآلي.


استبدال بطاقة مفقودة أو إصدار بطاقة جديدة

يمكنك ببساطة طلب بطاقة جديدة من خلال تطبيق بوبيان واستلامها من جهاز صراف آلي لبوبيان على مدار الساعة طوال أيام الأسبوع.


تعرّف على مساعد

تعرّف على مساعد، مساعدك الرقمي للخدمات المصرفية الشخصية. تحدّث معه واكتشف كل الخدمات التي يمكنه أن يقدمها لك.

"أفضل بنك إسلامي رقمي في العالم" – Global Finance

" أفضل خدمة عملاء في الكويت" – Service Hero


The Boubyan App is designed to provide you with best-in-class banking service wherever you are. With over 15 services and features available for the first time in Kuwait, the Boubyan App continues to set the standard for digital banking in Kuwait.

Your accounts, cards, deposits, and financing at your fingertips

Using the App, you can instantly view your accounts transactions, change your card’s PIN code, make finance payments, manage your deposits, and even open a new account or a fixed deposit. 

Send and receive money anywhere and anytime

Transfer money to any place in the world using normal bank transfers or Western Union. You can also send money to any holder of a Kuwaiti Civil ID and receive payments instantly from any holder of a Kuwaiti debit card simply by sharing a payment link with them. 

Withdraw cash without using your card

The cardless withdrawal service is available at all Boubyan ATMs throughout Kuwait. Set the amount through the App and pick it up at the ATM.

Replace a lost card or issue a new one 

Simply request a new card through the Boubyan App and pick it up at a Boubyan ATM 24/7.


Meet Msa3ed

Get to know Msa3ed, your personal banking digital assistant. Have a chat with him and discover what he can do for you.

“World’s Best Islamic Digital Bank” – Global Finance

“Best Customer Service in Kuwait” – Service Hero

developer: Al Mulla International Exchange Company KSCC
description:
If you want to remit money around the world easily, safely, quickly and smartly, you have tapped on the right app! There are good reasons Forbes ranked Al Mulla Exchange App the No. 1 app in Kuwait and 3rd in the Middle East and North Africa region in 2020. And we have gotten even better since then. Here are some of our key features:
 
* Easy to use and navigate
* Worldwide reach: 180+ countries
* Repeat previous transaction with ease
* Transfer to multiple beneficiaries with a single payment to us
* View, download and share transaction history and receipts
* Order foreign currency and have it delivered to your doorstep
* Update Civil ID information directly from app
* Check live exchange rates
* Add beneficiaries easily
* Instant support on WhatsApp Chat and call
* Locate any of Al Mulla Exchange 112+ branches in Kuwait
* Available in 8 languages: Arabic, English, Hindi, Tagalog, Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, and Marathi
 
With Al Mulla Exchange App, you can easily send money from Kuwait to countries around the world including:
•	Australia (AUD - Australian Dollar)
•	Bangladesh (BDT - Bangladeshi Taka)
•	Canada (CAD - Canadian Dollar)
•	Egypt (EGP - Egyptian Pound)
•	Europe (EUR - Euro)
•	India (INR - Indian Rupee)
•	Jordan (JOD - Jordanian Dinar)
•	Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (SAR – Saudi Riyal)
•	Nepal (NPR - Nepalese Rupee)
•	Pakistan (PKR - Pakistan Rupee)
•	Philippines (PHP - Philippine Peso)
•	Sri Lanka (LKR - Sri Lankan Rupee)
•	Turkey (TRY – Turkish Lira)
•	United Arab Emirates (AED - UAE Dirham)
•	United Kingdom (GBP - British Pound)
•	United States of America (USD - US Dollar)
              And many more!
Join our community of happy users by downloading the app today. We promise to exceed your expectations, not just meet them !
 
About Al Mulla Exchange
 
Al Mulla Exchange is the leading remittance and money exchange company in Kuwait. It was founded in 2001 and is a part of Al Mulla Group. The company operates 112+ branches across the country and enjoys the trust and loyalty of more than one million active customers. Al Mulla Exchange is known for driving innovations. In 2018, it became the first exchange company in Kuwait to launch a mobile remittance app that became one of the most downloaded financial services apps in the Middle East. Forbes has ranked the company among the Top 5 Exchange Houses in the GCC Going Digital.
 

Follow us
 
Facebook - www.facebook.com/almullaexchange/
Instagram - www.instagram.com/almullaexchange/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/AlMullaExchange
LinkedIn - www.linkedin.com/company/al-mulla-exchange/
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/c/AlMullaExchangeYT
Snapchat - https://www.snapchat.com/add/almullaexchange
  
Any questions?
Call/WhatsApp 1840123, Chat now wa.me/9651840123
Write to us at help@almullaexchange.com
Explore our website https://www.almullaexchange.com

Commercial Bank of Kuwait is one of the largest financial institutions in Kuwait with a strong and growing corporate and retail banking franchise providing innovative financial and investment solutions to its ever growing customer base. 
This Application is secure, convenient and easy to use, 
CBK Mobile offers a wide range of banking services to make banking convenient for you and allows you to view your balances, pay credit cards, payments, locate nearby Branches do lot more while on the go.

A New Experience Tailored For You.
 


Introducing the new NBK Mobile Banking App with an elevated user-friendly design, easier navigation, faster transactions and more personalized secure experience.

In addition to the various features, including:


•	Onboard to NBK as a new customer 
•	Learn more about the best offers and products 
•	Redeem your credit card rewards 
•	Manage your debit, prepaid and credit cards
•	Log in with Touch ID or Face ID 
•	View the history of transactions made on your accounts and credit cards
•	Transfer funds between your accounts, or to a beneficiary locally or internationally and the ability to track them
•	Transfer money from your credit card to your account (cash advance)
•	Access all our banking notifications gathered in one place with NBK Push Notifications 
•	Transfer to brokerage account
•	Transfer to/from Watani International Brokerage
•	Transfer money to your NBK Capital SmartWealth investment account
•	Add local and international beneficiaries 
•	Enjoy NBK Quick Pay 
•	Enjoy Bill Splitting
•	Make payments to your credit cards and telephone bills 
•	Open NBK Deposits 
•	Request account statements and checkbooks
•	View participating outlets in NBK Rewards Program 
•	Display common questions 
•	Make cardless withdrawal
•	Locate your nearest NBK Branch, ATM or CDM in Kuwait 
•	Contact us by calling NBK from inside and outside Kuwait or through our social media network
•	Locate branches and ATMs through the Augmented Reality feature
•	View travel tips
•	Use Al Jawhara, loan and term deposit calculators
•	View the exchange rate
•	Create NBK Prepaid Cards with different currencies 
•	Open accounts in Kuwaiti Dinar and other currencies
•	Activate dormant accounts
•	View NBK Miles and Rewards Points
•	Use live chat
•	Increase your monthly transfer limit 
•	Block and unblock your cards while traveling
•	Update your email and mobile number
•	View the details of Watani Money Market Funds and investment funds
•	Establish standing orders 
•	 Make currency exchange
•	Replace lost/ stolen card
•	Enable Dark Mode

And much more

The new NBK Mobile Banking App allows you to manage your account anytime, anywhere. It is available in Arabic and English.


For support, please call 1801801 or contact us on NBK WhatsApp 1801801. Our trained agents will be more than happy to assist around the clock.

Tam Mobile Banking app makes your banking experience even more convenient than ever before with a fresh and intuitive design. TAM banking features allow you to live locally and think globally, It’s more than a bank, it’s a lifestyle.

-Open an account on the go.
Download the Tam app and open your online bank account —right from your phone.  Get a tam virtual card and start using it right away. You can add your Tam card to Apple Pay.

-Instant virtual debit and prepaid Tam Card.
Get your virtual card instantly and enjoy the unlimited features with the extra layer of security of the Tam virtual card. Tam prepaid card is the smarter way to pay. Not just that— our prepaid cards also offer ease of use, simplicity, and the convenience of highly-desired rewards. 

-Transfers made fun and easy.
Sending and receiving money has never been easier and more fun. With one tap , you can send and receive money from your friends and family.

- Fun rewards program 
The more you use Tam, the more you get. Join TAM and discover a world of rewards, unique benefits, and exceptional events, experience the extraordinary.

- Dozens of cool designs to choose from your virtual card.
Customize your Tam virtual card the way you prefer. Let your card represent the real you.

Experience the latest and most advanced mobile banking app from Gulf Bank.
Redesigned to bring you a personalised banking experience that gives you a seamless experience, the updated Gulf Bank Mobile App is faster, more convenient, and includes numerous new banking services.

Capital.com: Trade derivatives on stocks, indices, gold and more

Discover a user-friendly app for trading built to help you go long or short on thousands of markets. Join over 750,000 users worldwide who choose Capital.com as their trusted broker, and trade derivatives without investing outright in assets on an Online Investments app.

Access financial markets and stay informed with real-time news – all from one secure platform for trading. Seamless integrations with TradingView and MetaTrader 4.

Choose from 4,800+ global markets

Explore a wide range of asset types including:
- Equities, eg stocks and shares
- Indices: eg US 100, UK 100 
- Commodities: eg gold, oil, gas 

Track the stock market and movements of share price across thousands of instruments.

Key features to support your trading

Investing in your trading journey: our platform offers tools that adapt to your strategy.
- Analysis tools
- Price alerts 
- Risk-management tools
- Market updates
- Demo account
- Access to TradingView and MetaTrader 4
- Zero fees on deposits and withdrawals*
- Multiple payment methods (varies by region)

Learn while you trade

- Guides to trading derivatives and understanding equities 
- Video tutorials, to help you build confidence and trade
- Market explainers, insights into share price and guidance on trading and analysing stocks over time
- Stock Exchange insights

Support when you need it

As a regulated broker, Capital.com helps you navigate the commodity and stock markets. Our expert support team is available 24/7 in English. Support is available in 10 languages.

Our app gives you the tools to trade, whether you're analysing the stock exchange, exploring commodities like gold and oil, or reacting to market news.

Award-winning platform
- 4.8 stars on Investing.com
- Best Trading Account (People’s Choice) 2025 – Good Money Guide
- Best Overall Trading Platform 2024 – Online Money Awards

Designed for anyone interested in the stock market – from beginners to seasoned traders.

Risk warning

Leveraged products are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Depending on the company, between 64%–82.78% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading leveraged products with Capital.com Group. You should consider whether you understand how these products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

Licences and regulation

Capital Com Online Investments Ltd. is a company incorporated in the Bahamas with registration number 209236B, authorised by the Securities Commission of The Bahamas (SCB) as a Registered Firm to carry on Securities Business under licence number SIA-F245.

CAPITAL COM MENA SECURITIES TRADING L.L.C is a company registered in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, and authorised by the Securities and Commodities Authority (SCA) under licence number 20200000176. Registered office: Jumeirah Emirates Towers, Emirates Towers Offices, Level L14, Unit 14C, Dubai, UAE.
Capital.com is regulated by the SCA. Over-the-counter leveraged derivative contracts, carry a high degree of risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. Trading over-the-counter leveraged derivatives may not be suitable for all investors. Before engaging in any trading activities, you should carefully consider your investment objectives, risk tolerance, and financial situation. Please seek independent financial advice before trading if necessary.

*Other fees apply.

Introducing Kuwait's best rewards program, KFH Rewards. As a holder of a  KFH Card, you get to unlock a world of opportunities by earning 10 KFH Points for every 1 KD you spend at participating partner stores. Enjoy the true meaning of rewards by using your KFH Points as a payment method across any participating partner stores. You can also unlock various exclusive deals and offers through online shopping. As a holder of a mid or high-tier KFH card, you get to be rewarded every time you swipe your card while shopping locally or abroad, in addition, you can access all the redemption options of KFH Rewards. As a holder of Visa Infinite, you can unlock all privileges with a permanent KFH Points multiplier of x1.5 for your card spend across your favorite retail stores.

نقدم لكم أفضل برنامج مكافآت في الكويت ، KFH Rewards. بصفتك حاملًا لبطاقة بيتك ، يمكنك فتح عالم من الفرص من خلال ربح 10 نقاط بيتك مقابل كل دينار واحد تنفقه في المتاجر الشريكة المشاركة والاستمتاع بالمعنى الحقيقي للمكافآت باستخدام نقاط بيتك كوسيلة للدفع عبر أي مشارك. المتاجر الشريكة. يمكنك أيضًا فتح مجموعة متنوعة من الصفقات والعروض الحصرية من خلال التسوق عبر الإنترنت. بصفتك حاملًا لبطاقة KFH متوسطة أو عالية المستوى ، ستحصل على مكافآت في كل مرة تقوم فيها بتمرير بطاقتك ، أثناء التسوق محليًا أو في الخارج ، بالإضافة إلى ذلك ، يمكنك الوصول إلى جميع خيارات الاسترداد الخاصة ببرنامج KFH Rewards. بصفتك حاملًا لبطاقة فيزا إنفينيت ، يمكنك فتح جميع الامتيازات من خلال مضاعف نقاط بيتك الدائم الذي يبلغ x1.5 مقابل إنفاق بطاقتك عبر متاجر البيع بالتجزئة المفضلة لديك.

Your dream is in your hands, with Tamara 

Tamara is the financial super-app that gives you full control over your finances. Enjoy the freedom to shop your way and the power to own your dream. 

SIGN UP IN MINUTES
Create your account with your ID and mobile number. No paperwork, no hassle. Your data stays safe, always.

PAY YOUR WAY
Choose to pay your way: split into installments or Pay in Full. Join millions of shoppers across Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, and Bahrain who enjoy secure, flexible and Sharia-compliant payments with Tamara. No late fees, ever!

SHOP ANYWHERE
Pay in 4 installments or more, at thousands of partners, online and in-store across, fashion, beauty, electronics, travel, furniture & many more. Just choose Tamara at check-out.

EXCLUSIVE DEALS
Save every time you shop with curated discounts and offers on your favourite stores and brands.

SMART MEMBERSHIP
Enjoy cashback & rewards with Tamara SMART, an exclusive membership program with premium perks such as cashbacks, built-in buyer protection and priority support. 

BUYER PROTECTION
Shop confidently and pay in installments with Tamara. We do everything to keep your shopping experience safe and secure. 

DISCOVER STORES NEARBY
Our newest feature allows you to discover stores near you that accept Tamara, making your shopping experience smooth and seamless. 

24/7 SUPPORT
Our team is here to help you every step of the way.


You’re just one click away from owning your dream. 

Download the Tamara App now

Discover a Smarter, Simpler Banking Experience.


The new ABK Mobile Banking App is designed to put you at the center of your banking journey. With a fresh look, enhanced features, and advanced security, it’s built to make your experience faster, easier, and more personalized than ever before.


What’s New?


•   Personalized Themes: A unique design tailored to your banking needs and preferences.
•   Enhanced Self-Service functionalities for enhanced convenience.
•   A faster and more flexible banking experience.
•   Redesigned, user-friendly interfaces.
 


In addition to the various features including:


•	Log in to the app instantly with Touch or Face ID.
•	Ability to share iBAN.
•	Between Accounts, ABK to ABK, Local, and international transfers.
•	WAMD for Simple, Fast, and reliable Payments. (Send & Receive).
•	Bill Splitting & Receive Payments through ABKPay and ABK Split
•	Onboard with Ease: Open an account as a new ABK customer in minutes.
•	Open deposits.
•	View Your deposit projections.
•	Open AlFouz, Savings, Daily Investment Account.
•	Calculate your AlFouz chances of winning.
•	Ability to update your Phone Number and Email Address.
•	Ability to Change your Login Password and Security Questions.
•	Access Anytime: Locate branches, ATMs, and CDMs with just a tap.
•	Ability to Manage your Devices, and Unlinking them.
•	Ability to provide Feedback & Suggestions based on Branch visits, Facilities, Services, Appreciation, or Negative Responses.
•	Ability to Submit an Official Complaint through the app.
•	Ability to view Inbox, Sent Items and create a new message within Message Center.
•	View history of transactions made on your accounts and cards.
•	Download eStatements .
•	Make Cardless withdrawals at ABK ATMs.

Warba Bank is excited to introduce its new app, which puts customers at the forefront of its attention. The app offers a personalized experience, with new home screen views and controls allowing customers to access all their banking products and services with just a few taps. These innovative features redefine the customer-focused experience for financial services. 
 
The New Home Screen 
• Select from two viewing modes for each section on the home screen: 
Detailed: comprehensive details for a complete overview at-a-glance. 
Summary: a minimalistic view for easy access and enhanced information privacy. 
• Order your home screen sections to bring what's important to you to the top of the page. 
• Add your most used services to the top of the home screen within our new quick-services bar or hide the section completely to free up space for other sections! 
• Your personalization preferences move with you across your linked devices. 
 
Banking Products: visibility and control over your Warba products  
• Check your accounts, financing, and term-deposit balances. 
• Request a new card or financing. 
• Open savings, gold, or term deposits. 
• Grow your savings consistently with Saving Goals (Hassala) 
• Add your cards to various supported digital wallets. 
• Claim unauthorized credit card transactions. 
 
Payments & Transfers: Convenient ways to pay & move funds 
• Transfer money locally and internationally via SWIFT, Super Transfer, or Western Union.  
• Send and receive money requests with Pay Me & I Pay services. 
• Split bills with your friends and send reminders to those who didn't pay. 
• Schedule, edit, or cancel standing transfer orders. 
 
Marketplace: Exclusive deals, offers, and promo codes 
• One-stop shop for exclusive and personalized offers and deals. 
• Gift your beloved ones with various online and retail gift. 
• Redeem valuable promo codes on your favorite brands. 
 
Pocket: Earn rewards points for every day’s activities 
• Earn points by using credit cards, paying bills, transferring salary, or inviting friends to open an account with Warba. 
• Use your points to pay bills, top up your cards or exchange them for Kuwait Airways Oasis miles. 
• Keep track of your points earning and redeeming activities via the points history page. 
 
Dashboard: Get a 360° view of your finances 
• Check daily spending categories and insights at-a-glance. 
• Set up budgets and track debit/credit card transactions. 
• Track your stocks’ performance by linking your KCC (Maqasa) account. 
 
Security: Keep your data safe & secure 
• Enable biometrics login and transaction authorization. 
• Manage all devices linked to your account. 
• Freeze/unfreeze your cards if you misplace your card. 
 
Communication: Open communication channel with Warba Bank 
• Get instant transaction push notifications instead of a slow and unreliable SMS. 
• Submit suggestions or requests via Communication Center for prompt feedback back. 
• Find the nearest Warba Bank branches and ATMs to you.

Easy and convenient, the Western Union® mobile app is the solution for sending money on the go from Kuwait.
 
With the Western Union® mobile app, you can always help your loved ones by transferring money straight to bank accounts, mobile wallets or in cash. All you need to do is create an online profile, verify your profile online using the Kuwait Mobile ID App, and you’re set.
 
Would you like to make international money transfers?
With more than 200 countries and territories(1) and 525,000 agent locations(1) around the globe, the Western Union® mobile app allows you to send money almost everywhere in the world.
 
How can I pay for my money transfer?
To fund an online transfer on the Western Union® mobile app in Kuwait, you need a locally issued debit card. 
 
Would you like to see the full estimate before you commit to a money transfer?
See the transfer fees and exchange rates up front so that you know exactly how much you need to fund your transfer. Exchange rates and fees are constantly updated so that your money goes further.
 
Do you make frequent money transfers?
Access your transfer history and send money to the same person again without having to enter their details. Use resend functionality or simply choose them from your contact list. Also, save details of your recipients for easier reference.
 
Did you know that you can earn My Wu℠ points?
Sign up for My Wu℠ with an agent and link your My WU number to your profile to earn points every time you complete a money transfer with us. You can also sign up for My Wu℠ while registering on the Western Union® app. You can log in to your My Wu℠ profile to see your membership status, check earned points, and redeem your points for rewards and discount offers.
 
Would you like to check your transfer status anytime?
Track your transfer status in just a click on the Western Union® app.
 
Any other features available on the app?
In addition to sending money on the go, the Western Union® mobile app allows you to update your contact list, personal information and even reach out to Customer Care.
 
Start making your money transfers smart today – install the app and enjoy the power of sending money globally from wherever you are!
 
For more details, visit WesternUnion.com.
 
 
Western Union has offices around the world and is headquartered in Denver, 7001 E. Belleview, Denver, CO 80237.
 
Do you have questions about our services? Contact one of our nearby Western Union agent location. Use our agent location finder to find one nearby or call our service centre tel:+17203321000.
 
(1)Network data as of 19 December 2023.
